review: This was a gift and my sister=in-lw loves it.
author: Gene Erken

review: I bought two of these to go with my two Fire TV boxes.  What a horrible experience.  I will be returning both.  All they seem to do is buffer.  I am very disappointed in Amazon.  I hope they get it together over there.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Love my fire stick but it needs more detail on its uses
author: Amazon Customerchris

review: I've used a bluray player and my Nintendo Wii for streaming services but the Fire stick is super user friendly and the connection speed is way faster that I was previously using on my Wii. Great purchase for the price point!
author: "ashebz"

review: I love the Fire TV Stick!  It saved me from buying a $500 stereo receiver on which to play my mP3's.  I synced my Amazon files and the few I uploaded that weren't purchased from Amazon, and now i am enjoying them all!
author: Ronald M. Coley, Jr
